properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 4 at 2:54AM PST until February 6 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 12
to 16 feet at 17 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head
OR out 60 NM.

* WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 4 AM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 AM PST THURSDAY
